kristofar eewi wisin pana pewu suparman charithaya ada kawil wisin nirupanaya karanne samajaya wisin thamawa aneka waradawa wataha ganu labima thula jiwath wemin wuwada yam dinayaka manushyathwaya wisin thamawa piliganu athayi yana balaporoththuwa peradariwaya.aththen ma eya methek apa dana siti 'ayan man'(siya hakiyawa yahapatha wenuwen yedawimata igena ganna dhanawatha) batman(thama pelanu labana paliganime chethanawa yahapatha wenuwen yedawimata igena ganna pidanayata path anatha tharunaya)wannawunta wada boho seyin wenas wannaki.amarikawe gambada parisarayaka yahapath pawul pasubimak thula hada wada ganimata lakwima heyin swabhawayenma yahapath charithayakin yuthu supar man haraha prekshakayata idiripathkerenuye samajaya yahapatha uganmata darana uthsahayath,yahapathe paramadarshayak badu wu eki suparman charithayayi.enam janamaya washayen dakwanna wu asamanya bala parakramayen yuthu meki pitasakwala jiwi charithaya samajaya wisin piliganimata uthsaha darana aakarayath bawa pawasima 'man of stil' chithrapatayata sak snayidar wisin dimata uthsaha dara athi arthakathanayayi.

niyangayen pida widina mahawilachchiya pradeshaye janathawata paniya jalaya bawusar dekak labadima sambandhayen kathabas kara ganimata giya eksath jathika pakshaye parlimenthu manthri ee.aar. ishak mahathage sambandhikarana lemwarayata anuradhapura batahira aasana sanwidhayaka amathya pi.harisan mahathage sambandhikarana lekamwaraya (sahodaraya) ha golayan pirisak pasugiya 6 wanida amanushika lesa paharadi thuwala sidukirima sambandhayen mahawilachchiya polisiyata paminillak idiripathkara thibe.
